title: OTel Host Metrics Dashboard
description:
Default dashboard to visualize OpenTelemetry host metrics from the hostmetrics receiver.

These metrics are prefixed by [otel.system](https://app.datadoghq.com/metric/summary?filter=otel.system). For additional details, see the [specification](https://opentelemetry.io/docs/reference/specification/metrics/semantic_conventions/system-metrics/#systempaging---pagingswap-metrics).

definition.title: Evolution of used RSS memory in the last hour
Bytes per second transmitted by host
Bytes per second received by host
Number of open TCP connections per second
Disk weighted IO time per second
